name: Hardline
desc: Increases points earned from killing enemies by 25%, by proxy increasing the amount of charge for Operator Skills per action, EXCEPT for the Munitions Box.

name: Persistence
desc: Scorestreak progression doesn't reset upon death, but cost is doubled for each Scorestreak once per match. Scorestreaks will also be divided into 3 ranks, and you can only equip one of each rank at the same time.

name: Demo Expert
desc: Increases the damage of explosives by 25%.

name: Dead Silence
desc: Grants silent movement while walking, crouching or during prone. Sound spread distance becomes shorter while sprinting.

name: Engineer
desc: Reveals enemy equipment and scorestreaks. Re-roll friendly Care Packages and booby trap enemy Care Packages.

name: Tactical Mask
desc: Reduces the duration of enemy tactical equipment effects by 40%.

name: Alert
desc: Shows a general location of enemies on the mini-map as they approach.

name: Shrapnel
desc: Spawn with a extra piece of lethal equipament. Explosive damage delays enemy health regeneration.

name: High Alert
desc: Your vision pulses when enemies outside of your view see you. Mark enemies, their equipment, and their scorestreaks by aiming down your sights.

name: Firepower Support
desc: Adds 2 reserve ammunition to all launchers. 40% chance to obtain the enemy's Scorestreaks when destroying it with a launcher.

name: Unit Support
desc: Operator Skill charges 40% from teammate kills, but your Operator Skill charge is reduced by 50%. 10% of Scorestreak charge comes from teammate kills when capturing Objectives. This perk only increases charging speed with will be adjusted according to the player count.

name: Survival Training
desc: Immune to the negative effects of a single hostile tactical item. 30 second cooldown.

name: Assassin
desc: After 90 secs in a match, high-threat enemies are marked on the mini-map and extro score bonuses are given for eliminating them, except in Search & Destroy. These enemies are ones who have activated 3 Scorestreaks or have a K-D ratio of over 4 without dying.
